issue.title: Error "Unable to locate package ros-melodic-ros1-ign" during build of docker image

content.raw: Just FYI, I followed the docker install instructions today and had the same issue because the --no-cache was not yet added to the build.bash file that your wiki has us pull. Adding that did fix the issue for me as well. Not sure if it’s the wiki that’s out of date or if the docker directory has not been fully updated to reflect some of the issues being tracked here.
